channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16753] There is a mismatch between suggested Java version in hbase-env.sh
item.description:
There is a mismatch between suggested JAVA version and default in comments in hbase-env.sh:


# The java implementation to use.  Java 1.7+ required.

# export JAVA_HOME=/usr/java/jdk1.6.0/
item.summary: There is a mismatch between suggested Java version in hbase-env.sh

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Changed JAVA_HOME to /usr/java/jdk1.8.0/ as stated in the line just above it.
Modified hbase-env.sh file for the java implementation to use. Java 1.8+ required. Changed default accordingly in comments.
I think we'll want to move this up to Java 1.8+ on master, right?

-1 overall

customfieldvalues.customfieldvalue: Updates the comments and default values in a few scripts and docs to reflect our Java 1.8+ requirement.
